root.str: Deploy construction objects near The Shattered Warpgate.
+ Fire Rate, Magazine Size / - Damage(Delete Me -BB)
The AF-4 Cyclone is a fully automatic submachine gun that has a higher damage output than most weapons in its class. NC use only.

The Vanu Sovereignty's Scorpius knife features a razor sharp edge using a proprietary alloy. Using similar tech as found in the Force Blade, the Scorpius's barbed blade makes removing the knife even more deadly than the initial wound.
Apply this armor to your MAX. NC use only.
Prevent the Terran Republic from locking 艾美瑞什
The Vanguard defensive certification 'Reinforced Top Armor' has been removed. Spent certifications have been refunded.
VS Patriot Flare Gun Copper Medal
Explosive detected on terminal control generator.

Whenever you spend longer than a total of 30 seconds outside of cloak without taking damage, your cloak's visibility will be reduced by 75%. Dying or taking damage from enemy sources will reset the benefit countdown. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>
The reinforcement spawn locations are where your empire needs you most. Defend your territory and eliminate the enemy threat at these locations.
Weapon mount on the front of the Flash.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24.
Cannot capture a point while in a vehicle.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 6.25% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Press [%s] to view Outfit Wars season
Equipment terminals can also be used to change loadouts and further customize your character.
Enhances the HUD by highlighting nearby enemy explosives.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a NC Hood Ornament. NC use only.

Unlocks the Flash XS-1 for your tactical loadout slot. These are resupplied using Merit points.

Single use consumable. Max 2 between resupplies.

The Flash XS-1 is a lightly armored, single-passenger vehicle designed for rapid deployment anywhere on the battlefield.
Increases nanite gain by 50% for 3 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
Earn kills as a MAX unit or against MAX units.

<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> Nascent Expeditions has asked for help and you're going to help them. This gives us good soldiers with a free ticket to Oshur and keeps the Republic from doing anything too evil. Have a chat with Nalla when you're ready.

Activate to passively reload your weapons for 9 seconds. Can be activated once every 48 seconds.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Customize your Flash with this white antenna ball. NC use only.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.
Apply the Patriot camo pattern to your Vehicle. VS use only.
Deal significant damage to enemy aircraft as a Heavy Assault.
Creates a nanite field that regenerates health in a radius around you. The more teammates near you the stronger the field is.

The M20 Wyvern has superior RPM and faster reload compared to other M20 heavy machine guns but at the cost of a smaller magazine. Like other M20 HMGs, its 20mm rounds are capable of damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.
Nanites repair damage over time as long as the vehicle has not taken damage within a few seconds.
NC - Sniper Rifle - Mid - V8 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 1095 rounds.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.75 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 58 meters and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 grenades.
Pilot a Galaxy/Valkyrie over distance with at least 2 additional passengers.
The TRAP-M1 can switch between short-range 3-round burst and long-range 2-round burst firing modes, allowing for incredible flexibility on the battlefield.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Hey, soldier. Buying the latest and greatest is fine, but there there's an art to keeping things running. A lost art, really. Heck, I bet you can't do it. Prove me wrong and I'll give you something shiny.
Enemies caught in the blast area will be ignited for 150 damage over 3 seconds, and blast damage on impact is reduced to 150.

The Pulsar Light Support Weapon (LSW) is a Pulsar variant with a high capacity battery and heavier barrel. Its reputation as a highly versatile weapon makes it a popular choice for missions where anything can happen. VS use only.
Cannot invite [*target*] to your platoon because it is full.
TR Multi Rocket Launcher - Test Weapon
the vehicle queue slot has expired
This customization adds a Cyan decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
Contains a Reaper DMR plus 1000 Certs
High Velocity Ammunition increases the weapon's projectile velocity by 5% and minimum damage range by 20 meters, but reduces the weapon's maximum damage range by 2 meters.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Oh, man. That was loud! But a deal's a deal. Your spooky, culty, purple chain thingy is under the tree. Gift-wrapped wit' a bow and everything.
Grants access to grenades which simulate the sound of weapons fire, project false radar signatures, and fool automated anti-infantry turrets.
Unlocked for Members - must maintain membership to use this loadout.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 700 rounds.
VS: MAX: Flame 01: Left Auraxium Medal
Increases the Nano-Regen Device's health regeneration.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Liberator to 30 minutes.
NS Patriot Flare Gun Silver Medal
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 338 rounds.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon will cloak you for 1.2 seconds. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks. Firing your weapon will immediately decloak you.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Apply the Roller Chain camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> The repair functionality produced by the Storm Buoy is an intended and ingenious new feature of our experimental technology. Congratulations on being part of this breakthrough!
<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Halfway there, operative. Hopefully those crystals aren't putting up too much of a fight.

One of the research team members was able to escape the now-flooded subterranean Oshur facility. Despite serious injuries, they may still be able to give some insight on what happened to the rest of their crew, as well as what necessitated the secrecy of a research project being conducted beneath the derelict genetics lab on a once-abandoned continent.
Unlock passive, always-on Certifications for the Galaxy.
A laser sight increases the user's hipfire accuracy by 33%.
Wrist-mounted nano-printers replenish explosives periodically, and require cooldown when overheated.
Reduce the acquire timer of all vehicles for 24 hours. Rank 48 required.

This is a Heavy Assault training mission, soldier. With the Heavy Assault class, equip your rocket launcher to damage armored targets, like tanks and aircraft. Your Nanite Mesh Generator ability will help reduce the damage from incoming fire, but will slow your movement while it is active. You're not invincible, so work with your team to help push into enemy bases.
Apply the single use Indar Highlands v1 camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Heavy Assault Composite Armor Package Description
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 25 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 rounds.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the ANT. VS use only.
Reduces NMG's full recharge time to 20 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 rockets.
Integrated power cells increase Jump Jet maximum fuel capacity.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.25 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 174 meters and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.
Increases xp and resource gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 6 months. Squad xp bonus stacks with other squad boosts.
Enter the deadly storm roaming the surface of Esamir wearing your newly acquired Insulated Suit.
Increases the amount of damage the deployment shield can withstand by 80%.
Single Use Indar Canyons v2 Armor Camo

Killing 4 enemies without being spotted will decrease the visibility of your Infiltrator cloak by 75%. Being spotted or getting killed will reset this benefit. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>
Upgrades the Medical Applicator to heal the Combat Medic while healing or reviving others
Adds 2 grenades to the default magazine size.
Adds chassis lights to the under carriage of the ANT. NC use only.
Contains a RASK Mk. III plus 1000 Certs
Reduces the time required to establish a lock-on with the weapon by 0.25 seconds.
Earn this service ribbon by restocking allied Cortium Silos
[*player*] has asked to be your friend.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.

Each year, the sights of Auraximas stir the spirits of soldiers everywhere; a reminder to take time for one another, and focus not only on the war, but the wonderland in which we wage it.

  • Snowman dot the landscape, and can be destroyed for extra experience.

  • Sanctuary has received uplifting Auraximas lights and sounds, and gifts for all.

  • There is a new holiday Directive as well as special daily Missions to partake in.

  • Check your Loadout Screen for holiday themed C-4, Ammunition Packs, and a deployable Tactical Snowman.

  • The Depot is stuffed with seasonal items, and other goodies.


    • Merry Auraximas, soldiers!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 36 rounds.
Freelance NSO cannot create or join outfits.
Cannot invite [*target*] to squad because it is not valid.
Many top players stream their play sessions, answer questions, and have instructional videos available to you online.

The Focused Proton RAD is a highly effective radiation plasma cannon. Upon impact, a 10 meter cloud of radioactive gas will harm targets inside the cloud for 10 seconds. This cannon requires greater accuracy to be effective.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin</font> Greetings, my child. The flora surrounding The Shattered Warpgate is of great interest to our medical personnel.
Activate to repair 25% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 47 seconds.
Cannot capture point because you are an invisible admin.
Apply the Splatter camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 140 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Great work soldier! Your efforts will be rewarded.
Wearable by Combat Medic. NC use only.
Kill a bounty target with an infantry explosive.
NC: Customization - Rocket Launcher Decimator Promo
When engaged, the afterburner burns fuel to increase the Liberator's top speed. An empty fuel tank regenerates in 30 seconds.
Applies a PlanetSide 1 Decal to your vehicle.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Members get free access to Campaigns and many other benefits.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Oh, and this isn't just going to be some walk along the beach, if you want to get paid then you'll need to eliminate some enemies and blow some things up. You know - the usual.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 10 rounds, and the weapon takes 15% longer to equip and unequip.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Malfunctioning Spy Drone:</font> Update, plzNoFriendlyFireNC. Download currently 90% complete. Continue to prevent interruptions.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 210.
Apply the Dazzle Dizzy camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 9.375%
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> We've detected a strange contrail signature and were able to narrow the search area. We're getting closer.
Everything you should know during your first 5 minutes playing PlanetSide 2.
This customization adds a L337 decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
Increases Nanovirus healing and infection strength.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 rockets.
Increases the lock on range of the missile launcher by 40 meters.
I've got eyes on an enemy spawn point.
Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 20 seconds.
Allows Proximity Mines to be carried in the Utility Pouch, increasing the overall carrying capacity by 1.
Increases the time it takes to lock-on to the vehicle by 1.25 second and prevents the vehicle from automatically appearing to hostiles based on proximity or radar detection.
Marks enemies you damage, and killing enemies clears spot attempts against you.
Learn how to make friends and join organized groups.

For marksmen that prefer to not put themselves directly in the fray, the Nanite Systems Quadra scope allows users distance between themselves and their intended targets. The Quadra comes equipped with a simple crosshair at 4x magnification.
NS designers created this long range scope to meet the demanding requirements of Auraxis’ best long range snipers.
When your shield breaks, it releases a pulse of repairing nanites that heal allied mechanical objects within 10m for 250 health over 4 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">Engineer only.</font>
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Sunderer by 10%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Get back to Esamir, soldier. More weird things are happening and that means you get to deal with it.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Vehicle optics have been reset, cert points spent on them have been refunded.
The Minotaur SX66's overcharged rounds possess greater lethality at long range.
Further increases the Infiltrator's Control Console hacking speed.
Damage from impacts striking the front of the Magrider are reduced by an additional 5%.
Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.
This rack of dumbfired Havoc Rockets launch in a barrage of four, inflicting a destabilizing field on impacted mechanical targets that prevent them from being repaired for a time. VS use only.
Allows the user to carry and place one additional anti-personnel mine or two additional anti-tank mines.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Magrider by 20%.
Adds chassis lights to the under carriage of the ANT. TR use only.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Reaver Inertial Dampener - Level 2
Applies a Flat on the Floor decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 rounds.
Increases zoom, but also increases aiming time.
Get the most popular Magrider weapons at a discounted price!
The Militant's Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
Single Use Snow Aspen Forest Weapon Camo
Applies a decal to your armor or vehicle. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 14 rockets.
Apply the single use Forest Greyscale camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.06 seconds.
Locking out players from the server
The spawn tube is where friendly soldiers spawn
Increases the yaw rate of the Scythe by 12 degrees/second.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> A job well done! Enjoy this near-mint condition copy of the 9th Song of Frost & Pyre novel! This badboy will be wrapped and waiting under the tree when you get back to Sanctuary.
Want more benefits AND the admiration of the Dev team?
The Dragoon is a heavy battle rifle with automatic firing capabilities that hits hard at any range. TR use only.
Wraps your Liberator in a heavy rust trim. All factions can use this.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 45 seconds.

Despite a common goal and shared purpose, Esamir remains a warzone. Soldiers from each empire race to The Shattered Warpgate not only to survey the damage at the behest of Nanite Systems, but to glean any additional information that can be shared with their own command structure, picking at the bones of the ancient alien technology. It's too early to say what rewards these expeditions will yield, but a feeling of urgency permeates the icy tundra.
Adds 2 rounds to the default magazine size.
The Corona O4 uses a slightly stronger magnification than its 3.4x predecessor, and simplifies target acquisition at mid to long range.
Learn about contract acquisitions from Emerson.

An outfit is a group of like-minded individuals striving to reach a common goal. After creating your outfit, you can invite players with "/outfit invite <playername>" or through the bottom of the member section of the outfit screen.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Change Mosquito inertial damping
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1 second, prevents the vehicle being auto detected on the mini-map and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I am told that you were detected in your last subterfuge efforts, this will be noted in your performance evaluation. However, I am also told that you will be one of the first to test new cloaking technology that may help prevent this issue in the future
The Illuminated Combat Optic line of gunsights from Nanite Systems are praised for their ability to quickly acquire targets in close quarters combat situations.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 20 shells.

Unlocks access to Advanced Specialization Program training Tier 2, resetting your battle rank and allowing you to gain new A.S.P. skills every 25 ranks. </br></br><font color="#bf0000">A.S.P. Tier 1 level 100 is required to purchase this item.</font>
Your class cannot Hack this terminal.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Flash by 240 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Here's your reward. Nanite Systems hopes to count on your services in the future!
Mounted on the tail of the Galaxy, this secondary weapon protects from threats to the rear. Operated by the passenger in seat 3.
NC: Profile BG: NC Logo Name Placeholder
Shows the compass at the top of the HUD. (Default: On)

You are about to leave the training continent of Koltyr.
Are you sure you want to leave?
Earned by being the Magrider driver when a passenger kills an enemy.
A low Battle Rank is no excuse for being cannon fodder. Step up your game and show Auraxis your potential with this bundle designed specifically to give new recruits everything they need to succeed.
Apply the Carbon Fiber camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> This was a Viridian Genetics facility that researching human augmentation on live subjects. Perhaps these researchers left the corporate world for the Vanu Sovereignty. I have been informed that this research may have practical applications.
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
Fortify your player-made bases against a variety of enemy attacks. Unlocks construction schematics for walls, gates, watchtowers, and more.
The objective is under NC control!
Contains a TS2 Inquisitor plus 1000 Certs
Activatable ability that revives nearby fallen soldiers
Increases the strength of the air brakes on the Mosquito by 5%.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
The high-powered T12 Baron's considerable stopping power makes it an excellent choice for finishing off wounded targets.
Reduces the amount of damage received from explosions by roughly 20%
Prevent the Vanu Sovereignty from locking Indar
The M12 Kobalt is a 50 cal machine gun that is effective against soft, infantry targets.
You must wait [*seconds*] more seconds before issuing another sitrep request.
Adds 2 rounds to the default magazine size.

Reduces the vehicle's health pool by 50% and replaces it with a shield layer of the same value. Whenever the shield takes damage, it will quickly repair itself after a 6 second delay. A fully depleted shield will double the cooldown before it starts regenerating again.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 210 rounds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Hey, soldier. Our enemies are constructing makeshift facilities with their ANTs. We must prevent them from establishing a foothold by destroying their bases and replacing them with our own.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Travel to an allied Containment Site
Missions are automatically assigned based on proximity to key objectives for your Empire. When in doubt, rally those around you and focus on completing your mission objective.

Increases the Bombardment Shield's base damage resistance of 50% to 60%

The Bombardment Shield is created when deploying into Skylance Battery mode. Find "Deployment: Skylance Battery" passive system in the "Colossus Certs" screen for more details.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> It appears we momentarily lost contact with one another. In the future I will endeavor to keep my communications more brief or perhaps find a way to allow you to progress through our conversation at a more rapid rate.

With the wild energies of Esamir seemingly controlled, the empires of Auraxis turn their attention to a strange pulsing signal picked up near the remnants of the shattered warpgate. Use new tools to locate the origin of the transmission and decipher the message.

Nanite Systems launched the Commander helmet for the most decorated leaders on Auraxis. Featuring a holographic eyepiece and long-range uplink antenna, this specially customized TR variant features an iridescent red Auraxium plating.
Reduces the timer for acquiring MAX armor by 210 seconds.
Apply the Woodland camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Adds tire spikes to your Flash. VS use only.
Increases zoom, but also increases aiming time.
The Flash Chaingun description goes here.
Nanite Revive Grenades revive nearby friendly soldiers upon detonation.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Liberator to 15 minutes.
Increases the amount of damage the deployment shield can withstand by 40%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 100 rounds.
Reduce the acquire timer of the Lightning and Vanguard for 2 hours. Rank 25 required.
Unlock mobility boosting Certifications for the Sunderer's performance slot. Performance slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Single Use Indar Dry Ocean Camo
Increasing this slider to the right will increase mouse sensitivity for zoomed-in scoped weapons. (Default: 0.25)

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Hey, soldier. The crystals kicked up by the Elysium Drills have proven valuable. Find a drill planetside and either use the NE-11 PML to break the crystals or kill nearby enemies who might do the same.
Apply the Woven Web camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
Insulated Armor Plating is available for purchase from Representative Ayla on Sanctuary.
Use the Analysis HUD implant to help you search for disabled vehicles in the Shattered Warpgate region.
Increases the time it takes for the turret to overheat during sustained fire.

You'd be out of your gourd to not rock this crimson-eyed jack-o'-lantern helmet.
+10% xp when worn
This item is only usable during Nanite of the Living Dead events.
When equipped, all units within 20 meters will gain ammo every few seconds
Adds custom hubcaps to your Flash. NSO use only.
The powerful AC-X11 was released shortly before Auraxis' global war yet still remains in common use due to its famed reliability and high stopping power. NC use only.
This insignia has a long history dating back to its origins on Earth. Those who wear it are recognized for their impressive service records in the Terran Republic.
Joining an outfit is a great way to learn, make friends, meet experienced players, and contribute to success on the battlefield.
Increases the amount of ammunition in the weapon's magazine.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Increases the braking performance of the Lightning by 10%.
Apply the single use Indar Highlands v2 camo pattern to your vehicle.
Apply the Mongo Spots camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Apply the Red Giraffe camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 90 rounds.
Heavy Assault: Activate charge ability 500 times

USE
Right-click on map to use.

DESCRIPTION
Requires Reserved Asset permissions.

Deploy a pod of 7 recon drones where each drone can detect infantry at a 50 meter radius. Once in position the drones will spread out to cover a roughly 100 meter area. Drones last 2 minutes or until shoot down by enemies.

Max 5.
A 7x magnitude zoom precision sniper scope.
Your petition to join [*guild*] has been revoked.
艾美瑞什: Capture and Hold 01
Get this bundled set of Black Ops infantry armors and helmet. For NC use only.
The Siren fires a barrage of smart rockets that will divert course when enemy aircraft are within range, pursuing their heat signature until impact. NSO use only.
Defend the Shield Console in the Isolation Tank Lab
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 735 rounds.
NC - Sniper Rifle - Long - V9 Description(Delete Me -BB)
The X2 enhances the zoom depth of the integrated Journey reflex optics for clearer target acquisition at slightly further ranges.

The right-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing, heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, and can challenge close-range infantry as well. This variant features classy flames over a black finish. All factions can use NS weapons.
Passively heals your group for a small amount of HP
Former convoy runner and current logistical specialist for the Nascent Expedition, Representative Nalla, seeks assistance in reliving some former adventures planetside.
Work as a team to destroy Bastion Fleet Carriers by attacking their glowing weakpoints. The carrier detonates when all weakpoints are destroyed.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 15%.
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Scrub Camo
The MAX locks down, becoming resistant to damage, but lowering its damage.
Killing an enemy player restores 30% jump jet fuel. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>
Next Rank: Further reduces damage taken from enemy fire, also reduces reuse cooldown timer from 33 to 30 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Apply the single use Sandy Scrub camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
This customization adds a Tan decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "P" Gold Hood Ornament.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
Lock status fetch failed with error [*error*], retrying...
You now have access to the /mentor chat channel, allowing you to help new players by answering questions and offering advice.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12.

Jagged fissures billowing plumes of Elysium sunder the icy permafrost of Esamir, foreshadowing renewed devastation if the potent energies that shattered the ancient Warpgate cannot be contained. Rising to the challenge, Nanite Systems has launched a bold initiative to thwart the impending catastrophe; the construction of three monolithic new facilities. These state of the art Containment Sites will require an abundance of resources, the coordination of the warring empires, and the answers to a few mysteries.
This customization adds a Purple decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
Kill enemy players with the NSX Yumi.
Speak with Representative Ayla in Sanctuary
New directive, weapon, and alert type!
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
But we're not done yet! Grab the limited time Two-Year Anniversary bundle and suit up for the next battle with exclusive gear and more!
Apply the Patriot camo pattern to your armor, weapon and vehicle. TR use only.
Customize your Harasser and tear up the roads of Auraxis with these tire spikes. All factions can use this gear.
All Access Members receive bonus benefits, like greater experience and resource gains, discounts, free Station/Battle Cash, and exclusive sales and events.
Failed to withdraw the asset from the oufit armory.
Apply the single use Snow Aspen Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Apply the Stripe camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
The device that game sounds will be played through.
Increases the roll rate of the Scythe by 4 degrees/second.
Apply the Plasma camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Speak to Facilitator Campner on Sanctuary to learn more about an exciting opportunity with Nanite Systems.
Slows and disorients enemies within its blast radius.
Allows the user to carry 3 Radar Scramblers at a time
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 rounds.
Increases the damage resistance to anti infantry weapons from 81.5% to 83%, this includes pistols, rifles, and vehicle mounted light machine guns.
Customize your Flash with this violet blinking antenna ball. VS use only.
Agents have uncovered a new lead regarding the presence of a third lost vehicle. Retrieve this classified schematic from its secure consoles and return it for further investigation.
Damaged and depleted shields recharge sooner
Applies a camo to your weapon. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 250 rounds.

Extensive trial runs have been conducted with the experimental suit-linked target acquisition system mounted to this carbine. The first rollout was given to skilled Jump operatives with the goal of further enhancing accuracy while airborne.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 29 rockets.
T2 Striker High Capacity Rocket Launcher
Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 55 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> This Stormglider Drone can be deployed within the storm to measure atmospheric resonance. Also, there aren't many of these drones left, and they won't rematerialize from the spawn tube with you.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 missiles.
You currently have no cards on file...
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 20%
You must exit your vehicle to use squad deploy.
Increases the yaw rate of the Reaver by 12 degrees/second.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Galaxy Inertial Dampener - Level 3

Deploy a temporary jump booster onto the battlefield. Standing near the booster greatly increases jump height.

Single use consumable. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Generates a decaying shield of nanites around the soldier that mitigates 35% damage instead of preventing it. Damage taken does not cause this shield to drain more quickly. Lasts up to 10.5 seconds.
Apply the Plasma camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Apply the single use Zebra camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Please proceed to each staging site and run a diagnostic scan on the energy geysers there. With any luck, conditions haven't changed too heavily.
Reduces damage taken from non-explosive projectiles.
Apply the 艾美瑞什 Brush camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 16%, and C-4 damage is reduced by 30%.
The experimental 3XB offers an automatic three-round burst that drastically increases accuracy over distance, while maintaining the expected sting of an SMG. NSO use only.
Apply the Sakura camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.

Activate MAD draining cortium and for the next several seconds cause shots from the main cannon to do increased damage, travel faster, and pierce vehicles. Each shot however will overheat the weapon's cooling system inflicting damage to the Colossus.

Cannot be used while deployed.
Apply the single use African Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
As always, your good deeds will be rewarded in the form of Certification Points which you can use to enhance your equipment, or diversify your arsenal.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 125 rounds.
The 2-round burst LA3 Desperado can quickly eliminate targets at close range. NC use only.
